answers.answer: Good but not looking forward to my doctor appointment. How about you?
Doing good my lil man is kicking away!! But like allocate said I'm not looking forward to my appointment today either! (Wic office) ugh!!

Morning ladies. I am beyond tired no sleep last night. I tried to go to my appointment earlier but too much rain I couldn't see and had to wait on the side if the road till it let up a bit. My docs office is an hour away. So I just rescheduled.
I feel great! I'm in nesting mode...been up since 6 and I've already cleaned the house and washed a load of laundry. Heading to breakfast with my mom now.
Feeling great! Like these other ladies also not looking forward to my doctor appointment. How about you?
Feeling ok. I'm at my doctors appointment right now and just drank that stuff for the diabetes test...now have to sit here and wait an hour.
Just got off work tired and ready to lay down
